name: Mavi's Journey
description: Mavi the half-beast Witch lives as a fortune teller in a town near the royal capital. One day, Mavi recieves word that the legendary medicinal herb "MoriMori" has been discovered. This is an RPG where you explore the world without any battles to hinder you.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
